snippet: Justine Cushing, Melih Ozdil and Joel Wooldridge of New York, and Lew Finkel of Jupiter, Fla., were by far the most successful players at the Long Island Fall Regional in Smithtown, N.Y., last week.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on deal played at the Long Island Fall Regional in Smithtown, NY.
lead_paragraph: Justine Cushing, Melih Ozdil and Joel Wooldridge of New York, and Lew Finkel of Jupiter, Fla., were by far the most successful players at the Long Island Fall Regional in Smithtown, N.Y., last week.

headline.main: At the Long Island Fall Regional
